analysis.description:

	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0x411139af515804562ddca220220728c9791cc714.sol#51-52)

	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0x411139af515804562ddca220220728c9791cc714.sol#103-106)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x411139af515804562ddca220220728c9791cc714.sol:
	Contract BountyKN has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x411139af515804562ddca220220728c9791cc714.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in BountyKN.fallback (/unique_contracts/0x411139af515804562ddca220220728c9791cc714.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,toks) (/unique_contracts/0x411139af515804562ddca220220728c9791cc714.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokens (/unique_contracts/0x411139af515804562ddca220220728c9791cc714.sol)
